title: A Halloween Misadventure at Disneyland Paris
text:
WHAT HAPPENED WAS, we stole our children’s Halloween and needed, somehow, to give it back.

We’d made plans to join friends in Paris at the end of October, when the weather might be dicey, but the airfares were golden. Our daughters, ages 13 and 11, were excited about France but outraged we were arriving on the 31st. I made the case that the adventure you didn’t know was always better than the same old thing. “We’ll just celebrate a French Halloween,” I assured them. “Imagine how much better the candy will be!” But further...
description: After encountering French zombies and a parade of Disney villains, author Dan Kois and his family learn what happens when the magic runs out at the Magic Kingdom.
